articles.content:
You can still bank online or use Post Office services if your branch is closing
Lloyds Banking Group says affected customers will still have a choice in how they bank, with options including telepho… [+682 chars]

articles.title: New powers to seize alcohol in Bournemouth, Christchurch and Poole - BBC News
articles.description: Police and officials will be able to order people behaving anti-socially to give up their drinks.
articles.content:
image captionBournemouth beach has once again seen a surge in visitors
Three seaside resorts will see new rules in a bid to curb drink-related disorder, a council has agreed.
